name: Sensory Deprivation Pitfall
description:
This game is an adult simulation game in which you play with a beautiful woman who is an experimental subject in a sensory deprivation pit.
Please read the following instruction manual carefully, Enjoy this safe and fun simulation.


[instruction manual]

1. product summary
Product name: Sensory Deprivation Pitfall


This device enables sensory deprivation of the upper and lower body.
A person who falls into the pitfall cannot escape on his/her own and is placed under the control of the device.



2. functional overview
Sensory deprivation system: The device shuts off the senses of the lower body of a person who falls into the hole, making it impossible for the person to feel internal stimuli.
Tentacle control: The device can be used to manipulate the tentacles to carry out attacks against the human.
Sensory gauge: Sensation is accumulated in a gauge and can be given all at once as a large shock.


3. operation methods
3.1 Scrolling operation
　Screen zoom: The screen can be zoomed in and out by operating the scroll.
　Screen movement: Hold down the scroll and drag to move the screen up, down, left, or right.
3.2 Basic device operations
　Shock: Accumulated sensation can be given as a large shock.
3.2 Tentacle Operation
　Normal Mode: Tentacle tip can be manipulated with the mouse.
　Vaginal Attack: Perform piston thrusts.
　Auto mode: Piston can be performed automatically. Speed can be adjusted.
　Ejaculation: The ejaculation gauge builds up as you continue to piston, and when it is full, you can ejaculate. 4.


4. equipment enhancement
Point gain: Skill 1 is gained by impacting the circular gauge in the upper right corner until it runs out.
For this Skill 1, you can strengthen one of the skills by one level.
Items that can be strengthened (3 levels):
Left Tentacle: Speed of auto-attack, intensity of stimulation
Right tentacle: speed of auto-attack, intensity of stimulation


5. settings
Move location: you can choose between the experimental facility and the outside environment.
Screen Settings: Window size can be adjusted.
Sound settings: Volume, sound effects, etc. can be adjusted.


6. precautions
This device is a fictitious simulation and does not actually harm humans.
During the shock transfer by the blocking device, any attack will be disabled. Attempts to attack during this period will be ineffective.
Please use this device with caution and follow the instructions.


7. troubleshooting
7.1 When the device operation is unstable
　Problem: The operation of the device is unstable or does not exhibit the expected behavior.
　Solution: Reset the instrument's system using the """"Restart"""" option in the configuration menu.
